Referential.SQLJoin: left outer join ( select tblmain.IDDC,case when im_dc.INITIALMARGINMETH is null then (case when im_mk.INITIALMARGINMETH is null then im_css.INITIALMARGINMETH else im_mk.INITIALMARGINMETH end) else im_dc.INITIALMARGINMETH end as INITIALMARGINMETH from DERIVATIVECONTRACT tblmain inner join dbo.MARKET mk on mk.IDM = tblmain.IDM left outer join dbo.CSS css on css.IDA = mk.IDA left outer join dbo.IMMETHOD im_dc on (im_dc.IDIMMETHOD = tblmain.IDIMMETHOD) left outer join dbo.IMMETHOD im_mk on (im_mk.IDIMMETHOD = case tblmain.CATEGORY when 'O' then mk.IDIMMETHODETDOPT else mk.IDIMMETHOD end) left outer join dbo.IMMETHOD im_css on (im_css.IDIMMETHOD = case tblmain.CATEGORY when 'O' then css.IDIMMETHODETDOPT else css.IDIMMETHOD end) ) immeth on immeth.IDDC = tblmain.IDDC

SQLWhere.SQLJoin: inner join dbo.SESSIONRESTRICT sri on sri.ID=tblmain.IDI and sri.CLASS='INSTRUMENT' and sri.SESSIONID='%%SESSIONID%%'
inner join dbo.SESSIONRESTRICT srm on srm.ID=tblmain.IDM and srm.CLASS='MARKET' and srm.SESSIONID='%%SESSIONID%%'
left outer join dbo.SESSIONRESTRICT sri2 on sri2.ID=tblmain.IDI_UNL and sri2.CLASS='INSTRUMENT' and sri2.SESSIONID='%%SESSIONID%%'
inner join dbo.MARKET m on m.IDM = tblmain.IDM and m.IDENTIFIER=@MARKET
SQLWhere.SQLWhere: ((tblmain.IDI = @IDI) and (tblmain.DTENABLED <= @BUSINESSDATE)) and (tblmain.DTENABLED <= getdate() and (tblmain.DTDISABLED is null or tblmain.DTDISABLED>getdate()))

Condition.SQLWhere: IDMATURITYRULE in ( select min(IDMATURITYRULE) from dbo.VW_MATURITYRULE where (DTENABLED <= getdate() and ((DTDISABLED is null) or (DTDISABLED > getdate()))) group by IDENTIFIER)

Information.ToolTipMessage: FIX: Tag 48 SecurityID. Security identifier value of SecurityIDSource (22) type (e.g. CUSIP, SEDOL, ISIN, etc). Requires SecurityIDSource. Tag 22 SecurityIDSource.Identifies class or source of the SecurityID (48) value. Required if SecurityID is specified. 20022: ISIN. International Securities Identification Number (ISIN). A numbering system designed by the United Nation's International Organisation for Standardisation (ISO). The ISIN is composed of a 2-character prefix representing the country of issue, followed by the national security number (if one exists), and a check digit. Each country has a national numbering agency that assigns ISIN numbers for securities in that country.
FIX: Tag 228 For Derivatives: Contract Value Factor by which price must be adjusted to determine the true nominal value of one futures/options contract. (Qty * Price) * Factor = Nominal Value

FIX:\r\nTag 231 \r\nSpecifies the ratio or multiply factor to convert from "nominal" units (e.g. contracts) to total units (e.g. shares) (e.g. 1.0, 100, 1000, etc). Applicable For Fixed Income, Convertible Bonds, Derivatives, etc.
FIX: Tag 1193 SettlMethod. Settlement method for a contract. Can be used as an alternative to CFI Code value. Tag 1317 DerivativeSettlMethod. Refer to definition of SettlMethod(1193).

Condition.SQLWhere: IDIMMETHOD in ( select min(IDIMMETHOD) from dbo.IMMETHOD where (DTENABLED <= getdate() and ((DTDISABLED is null) or (DTDISABLED > getdate()))) group by IDENTIFIER)

Information.ToolTipMessage: FIX:\r\nTag 969 MinPriceIncrement.\r\nMinimum price increase for a given exchange-traded Instrument.

FIX:\r\nTag 1146 MinPriceIncrementAmount.\r\nMinimum price increment amount associated with the MinPriceIncrement ( tag 969). For listed derivatives, the value can be calculated by multiplying MinPriceIncrement by ContractValueFactor(231).
FIX:\r\nTag 423 PriceType.\r\nCode to represent the price type.
Sélectionner la règle d'arrondi à appliquer sur les prix moyens pondérés dans le cas des trades résultant d'une fusion (Merge).
FIX:\r\nTag 996 UnitOfMeasure.\r\nThe unit of measure of the underlying commodity upon which the contract is based.

FIX:\r\nTag 1147 UnitOfMeasureQty.\r\nUsed to indicate the quantity of the underlying commodity unit of measure on which the contract is based, such as, 2500 lbs of lean cattle, 1000 barrels of crude oil, 1000 bushels of corn, etc. UnitOfMeasureQty is required for UnitOfMeasure(996) Variable Quantity UOMs enumerations. Refer to the definition of UnitOfMeasure(996) for more information on the use of UnitOfMeasureQty.
Indicates the groups of ISO 10962 standard, Classification of Financial Instruments (CFI code).
Indicates the underlying assets of ISO 10962 standard, Classification of Financial Instruments (CFI code).
FIX: Tag 1194 ExerciseStyle. Type of exercise of a derivatives security. Tag 1299 DerivativeExerciseStyle. Type of exercise of a derivatives security.
FIX:\r\nTag 744 AssignmentMethod.\r\nMethod by which short positions are assigned to an exercise notice during exercise and assignment processing
FIX:\r\nTag 1204 StrikeIncrement.\r\nValue by which strike price should be incremented within the specified price range.
FIX:\r\nTag 1202 StartStrikePxRange.\r\nStarting price for the range to which the StrikeIncrement applies. Price refers to the price of the underlying
FIX:\r\nTag 1203 EndStrikePxRange.\r\nEnding price of the range to which the StrikeIncrement applies. Price refers to the price of the underlying.

SPAN:\r\nStandard Portfolio ANalysis of risk is a method of calculating initial margin by evaluating portfolio risk under a number of scenarios. It was originally developed by the Chicago Mercantile Exchange.

SPAN:\r\nStandard Portfolio ANalysis of risk is a method of calculating initial margin by evaluating portfolio risk under a number of scenarios. It was originally developed by the Chicago Mercantile Exchange.
